meanings.definition: The process of voting in an election.
meanings.sent1: During the balloting, people choose their leaders.
meanings.sent2: The balloting for the student council president will take place next week.
meanings.sent3: At the balloting, everyone eagerly picked their favorite candidate.
meanings.sent4: The balloting in the classroom resembled a mini democracy in action.
meanings.sent5: The excitement during the balloting was palpable as each vote was cast.

meanings.definition: A method of selecting a candidate by voting.
meanings.sent1: In the balloting process, the most popular candidate wins.
meanings.sent2: The balloting system ensures fairness in choosing the winner.
meanings.sent3: During the balloting, the candidates nervously awaited the results.
meanings.sent4: The balloting method is a democratic way to make decisions.
meanings.sent5: The balloting outcome can sometimes surprise even the candidates themselves.

meanings.definition: The act of casting or recording votes.
meanings.sent1: The balloting was done secretly to protect each person's choice.
meanings.sent2: After the balloting, the votes were counted to determine the winner.
meanings.sent3: During the balloting, some people accidentally spoiled their ballots.
meanings.sent4: The balloting process ensures that every vote is accounted for.
meanings.sent5: The precision of the balloting procedure guarantees accurate results.
